title: HAWKS at HEAT | NBA PRESEASON FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | October 4, 2021
author: NBA
description:
HAWKS at HEAT | NBA PRESEASON FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | October 4, 2021

The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks, 125-99. Bam Adebayo recorded 14 PTS and 5 REB for the Heat, while Kyle Lowry added 5 PTS, 4 REB and 7 AST in the victory. Trae Young tallied 14 PTS and 3 AST for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 1-0 in the preseason, while the Hawks fall to 0-1.

Next Games:
Cleveland Cavaliers vs. Atlanta Hawks - October 6 at 7:30pm/et on NBA League Pass
Miami Heat vs. Houston Rockets - October 7 at 10pm/et on ESPN2
